amendment.description: An amendment to provide $30 million for "Medical Care" for health care benefits for Filipino World War II veterans who were excluded from benefits by the Rescissions Acts of 1946. The $30 million in funds would be designated as "emergency" funds.

action.text: Mr. Walsh raised a point of order against the Filner amendment (A008). The amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
